QuestData.Title: Troll Patrol: Creature Comforts
QuestData.Description: Well, it ain't glamorous, but it needs doin'.$b$bMy troops have been fightin' their hearts out while knee-deep in stagnant water for days on end. That just can't be good fer ya.$b$bWhat they need is a nice fire to dry 'em out and lighten their spirits.$b$bThis part of the city's soaked, but the dead roots of these thornwood trees have a way of resistin' the moisture.$b$bRound us up some fuel for burnin' and we'll be mighty grateful.
QuestData.LogDescription: Captain Grondel at Drak'Agal wants you to bring him 20 pieces of Dead Thornwood.
QuestData.CompletionText: Ya got the wood fer a fire, $r?
QuestData.RewardText: Mighty kind of ya, $n. Mighty kind indeed.$b$bNow you'll be findin' Cap'n Arnath due west o' here, just over the rise.
